attributes.action: Restrict access to all social media platforms for children under the age of 16
attributes.additional_details: Restrict access to social platforms for children under the age of 16. Let's keep children safe.
attributes.background: Restrict access to all social media platforms for children under the age of 16. This will protect our children from toxic content and avoiding long-term mental health problems. Also keeping them safe from online predators. Please consider this request to keep our loved ones safe.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/710283
